alert.note: Alert for Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 30 at 2:19PM CDT until October 31 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Bayfield County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of heavy snow is expected to develop across western Lake Superior this evening. This band of snow will push onshore overnight and could produce snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour. Timing of when the band will move across the land remains in flux and could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
